stories.text:
HI,
so i had a girl in my 5th standard and i loved her soo much but then i never had guts to confess to her and i never even talked to her or any girl as i am an introvert i can't talk to girls(any excpet my mom lol) i just go blank and don't even
know what to talk.After my 5th got over i used to see her in the school and rn i am in 12th standard(love still persists) and since
 the school is online but exams are in school i saw her but still didn't even say hi kuz i am dumb. And then i found her insta in my suggestion i litreallly thought should i follow her or not for 1 week and then i just took the guts to do it.
so i just followed (requested) her and she even accepted my req. and followed me back .
and the thing i don't even know if she has a boyfriend or not .
can someone help me out how do i confess her or should i even to confess her bcoz after 1 month my 12th is getting over and i am going abroad for degree and probably won't see her again.
some help me out plz!
i am craving for her so badly
and sad thing is only 3 days i have to go school for exam's and after tat imma leave the country:(
(ik this ain't the right place to write this but then there's ain't place to write it anonymously and get reply)
stories.title: How do I confess her
